data.displayName: Residential Market - Time of Use with Controlled Load

fees.description:
A printed bill fee applies to each posted bill.
For further details on the information presented in this fact sheet, or the terms and conditions of the contract, please visit www.dodo.com/energy/terms-prices-and-regulatory-information.
A surcharge applies to all American Express and Diners Club card payments. Payments made via MasterCard or Visa do not incur any surcharge.
Dishonoured Payment fee may apply to payments we attempt that are subsequently declined.
Service fees may apply when we request to de-energise a property or if you require a meter reading for any purpose.
Service fees may apply when we request to energise a property or if you require a meter reading for any purpose.

electricityContract.terms: See our full terms and conditions at www.dodo.com/energy/terms-prices-and-regulatory-information. If you are eligible, you can apply to receive Victorian Government concessions.
electricityContract.variation: Dodo Power & Gas may vary your energy rates not more than once every 12 months by giving you notice of this change not less than five (5) business days before it comes into effect.

eligibility.information: Applicable to a Residential Customer in the Jemena distribution zone & verification of meter type. See terms & conditions for other eligibility criteria, including solar feed-in tariff eligibility.

singleRate.description: for hot water and/or storage space heaters (only on for a controlled period)

greenPowerCharges.description: $0.099 per kWh (inc GST) – Electricity equal to 10% of your consumption is sourced from GreenPower. Discounts do not apply to GreenPower.
$0.099 per kWh (inc GST) – Electricity equal to 100% of your consumption is sourced from GreenPower. Discounts do not apply to GreenPower.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: No Term contracts do not expire
